item.title: Avalon News for March 2020
item.description: Avalon Reminders Help keep Avalon beautiful by maintaining your yard and home. Hace your home power washed if there is mold on the exterior. Garbage, recycling, and yard trash should be put curbside only the night before pickup and receptacles removed by the day after pickup. Please take a bag to clean up after your dog when walking in Avalon. Lock vehicles left in th edriveway and don’t leave anything valuable in sight.
